item.title: Variational Quantum Algorithms as Machine Learning Models
item.author: Author
item.description: Variational Quantum Algorithms as Machine Learning Models Few days ago, we had the PhD End of Year Seminars at my Department, and I presented my contributions to the field of Variational Quantum Algorithms. Here is my presentation, go check it out: presentation. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: Variational Learning for quantum artificial neural networks
item.author: Author
item.description: Variational Learning for quantum artificial neural networks Here is the presentation for the contributing talk I gave at the Summer School: Machine Learning for Quantum Physics and Chemistry organized by the wonderful team at University of Warsaw! The talk is based on this work: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9364892 Slides Video Paper ðŸ˜‰

item.title: What is Quantum Machine Learning?
item.author: Author
item.description: What is Quantum Machine Learning? Yesterday I took part in the End of Year seminars of PhD students at University of Pavia. For the end of my first year, I had to I talk about my research field, Quantum Machine Learning, introducing the state of the art, drawbacks and future possibilities. Here is my presentation, go check it out: presentation. ðŸ˜‰
